section.p: The rukh’s claws pluck you from the deck as if you were a rabbit in a field. You are carried up and up; the pale, upturned faces of your crew grow more and more distant, until your ship is nothing but a speck on the ocean.
You will never see them again. Cross the ship, cargo and crew off your Ship’s Manifest.

The rukh screeches deafeningly; its wingbeats are like thunder. It flies for hours until it comes to a remote mountain peak. There it tosses you unceremoniously into a nest made of tree trunks where a young rukh is cawing for food. The parent flies off, but you must fight the chick, which is twice your size!
If you lose, it eats you - . If you win, .
